name: crochet strawberry plush
notes:
materials

weight 6 yarn – i used bernat blanket yarn in the colors “race car red”, “go go green”, “pixie pink” and “vanilla.” i used less than an entire skein for each color, there should be enough left over to make a second strawberry from the same skeins.

10.00mm crochet hook

scissors – small, cute and sharp!

stitch markers – love these because they are secure and won’t fall out of your work.

darning needle – my faves 

stitches + abbreviations

ch = chain

sc = single crochet

st(s) = stitch(es)

rep = repeat

inc = increase

dec = decrease

blo – back loop only

flo = front loop only
